title: Gary Johnson: ‘Forget Global Warming Because the Sun Will Envelop Us All One Day’
subtitle: The Libertarian candidate said 'global warming is in our future' because 'the sun is going to actually grow and encompass the Earth,' but what he meant is uncertain.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Gary Johnson once said 'global warming is in our future' because 'the sun is going to actually grow and encompass the Earth.'
